original_text: “‘When a man has an emission of semen, he must bathe his whole body with water, and he will be unclean till evening.
korean_text: 설정한 자는 전신을 물로 씻을 것이며 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: When a man has an emission of semen
he must bathe his whole body with water
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 온 몸을 물로 씻어야 하며

sentences.original_text: and he will be unclean till evening
